Applicant : Walker, Colton
School (district) : Marsh Valley High School (Marsh Valley School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I have started STEM Outreach/Mentorship programs where I go to rural communities with my students to engage and interact with students to show them the benefits of STEM. I also help out with various athletic departments in my community. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I hope this program will continue to help me connect to individuals in the work force that I can use to network with to better help my students as well as giving me the new skills and knowledge that I can share with my students. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Hybrid
	* In-Person

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
